about_the_game:
Have you been hunting for an action-packed, never-ending couch multiplayer game? Look no further! Join the PowerBots team in solving puzzles, building space stations, and fending off enemies. Take back the PowerStones to save the universe from grave danger!

Story Mode

The PowerBots are keepers of the peace - but EvilBot and his minions have challenged them to stand up for what is right. Help them retrieve the stolen PowerStones back from EvilBot and return them to their rightful place. Story Mode includes two boss battles, four puzzle levels, and a sandbox-style home base where you can customize your own space station.

  • Atalo Field - Atalo Field is considered a haven for all life on Power Planet. Even with the presence of enemy threats, it manages to hang tightly to its peaceful nature.
  • Kismet Mountain - A withering test of fate for those who dare to climb! It's rumored that many who attempt to conquer the heights of Kismet Mountain end up frozen in time.
  • Elderitch Cave - A haunting cave that few are brave enough to find. These caves are full of mining structures, rivers, and naturally occurring PowerStones.
  • Arcane Realm - A dark and mysterious dimension that will test your inner strength! Will you be able to find your way out of this enigmatic arena?
  • Space Station - Home of the PowerBots team! When they're not enjoying the beautiful scenes of Atalo Field, the PowerBots are courageously on the lookout for outer-world threats to Power Planet. The space station is a unique free-play level with endless building fun! You can build and decorate your interior and even save your design for the next play session.


    Party Play Modes

    Whether you're playing solo, or with up to four players in split-screen, Party Mode is loads of fun! Don't have four controllers? You can use our whacky four-player keyboard mode to keep the craziness going!


    • Last Bot Standing - Minimum of two players. Fight against other players for a battle of the best!
    • Asteroid Attack - Keep building rapidly to stay alive! Asteroids are constantly attacking your base in this space-station frenzy.
    • Race to the Finish - Compete against time or your friends in this challenging race mode.
    • Free Play - Relax and build with friends! Randomized events will make this a fun mode of endless play.

    Characters

    • ShockBot - The newest member of the PowerBots crew. Story Mode follows ShockBot through his blissful yet courageous journey in a battle to save Power Planet from the ongoing conflict.

    • CareBot - A well manored bot with extensive knowledge. She is always here for encouraging words and insightful advice.

    • EvilBot - A poorly misguided bot who feels threatened much too easily. His greed has caused a rampant thirst for power.

    • PunkBot - A fed up robot who specializes in combat. Anyone who challenges her is sure to meet their doom!

    • RockBot - PunkBot's brother. Perhaps the most chill of all PowerBots. RockBot remains calm through all situations.

    Single Button Base Building

    The base-building mechanics make this game easy for anyone to pick up in a few minutes! There are several game modes and the easy-to-use building feature provides a unique advantage to each one.

    Spirit Emblem Abilities

    ShockBot can pick up Spirit Emblems along his journey. Each emblem connects to an ancient spirit that gives ShockBot a unique ability.
    • Dash Slash - Dash with great speed to move forward quickly or surprise enemies with a speedy attack.
    • Ground Pound - Strike the ground with an incredible PowerStone-fueled force. The shockwave provides a protective shield that also destroys surrounding enemies.
    • Gravity Bomb - Use the gravity bomb to pull enemies toward you, jump to new lengths, or launch your foes into the abyss.

    What are you waiting for? Power Planet needs your help! Purchase PowerBots Builders on Steam today.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: The PowerStones have been stolen! Join the PowerBots in their mission to take them back. Help ShockBot solve puzzles, build bases, survive asteroid fields, defeat challenging bosses, and save the universe. Bring up to four players for local split-screen fun!
